arts.ttl: Jonathan David future: New favourite 'emerges' for Lille marksman who is 'also wanted' by Man United, Liverpool
arts.sum: Inter Milan allegedly emerge as leading contenders to sign Lille forward Jonathan David on a free transfer at the end of the season.

arts.ttl: Jonathan David transfer news: Free agent makes €50m transfer demand
arts.sum: Lille striker Jonathan David will be a free agent when his contract expires at the end of June, but the clubs eyeing up the Canada striker should be aware that does not mean he will come cheap. Gazzetta dello Sport reports that the Nerazzurri have made the first move to sign David on a free transfer in the summer, offering him a five-year contract worth €5 million net per year.

arts.ttl: Toulouse predicted XI v Lille: Zakaria Aboukhlal remains absent

arts.ttl: Inter make new contact for Lille’s Jonathan David amidst Arsenal interest
arts.sum: Inter are attempting to land Lille’s Jonathan David, amidst interest from Barcelona and Arsenal. The Canada star’s current deal runs out in the summer of 2025 and he will be…

arts.ttl: Preview: Toulouse vs. Lille - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Ligue 1 clash between Toulouse and Lille, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
